Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Relates to admission to a special high school in the city of New York
Summary: Relates to admission to a special high school in the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to admission to the specialized high schools in the city of New York
